settings.text:
Join the "bloomers" club email list. We send emails out every month-ish. In them we profile our favourite flower that is in bloom, along with news from the farm and any special we've got on for bloomers.

Want to win a wonderful day out at a farm workshop? If you sign up before the 27th of May, you'llÂ automatically be entered in a drawing to win a free space at a workshop of your choice!

Just pop your email address in the box and we'll get you signed up.
